languages.text: Великолепная броня покрыта вязью гексаграмматических оберегов. На визорах шлема вырезаны микроруны, призывающие милость духов охоты. Кровь, пролитая владельцем этого священного доспеха, не пропадет втуне — под панцирем керамита таится хитроумный механизм, собирающий каждую каплю священной алой влаги, чтобы впоследствии она могла стать основой целебных бальзамов и священных зелий рунного жреца.

The magnificent armour is covered in hexagrammic wards, and the helmet's visors are carved with microrunes invoking the beneficence of the spirits of the hunt. Any blood shed by the wearer of this sacred armour will not be in vain — beneath the ceramite shell is an ingenious mechanism that collects every blessed drop of crimson, so that it can later serve as the basis for a Rune Priest's healing balms and sacred potions.
languages.original_text: Великолепная броня покрыта вязью гексаграмматических оберегов. На визорах шлема вырезаны микроруны, призывающие милость духов охоты. Кровь, пролитая владельцем этого священного доспеха, не пропадет втуне — под панцирем керамита таится хитроумный механизм, собирающий каждую каплю священной алой влаги, чтобы впоследствии она могла стать основой целебных бальзамов и священных зелий рунного жреца.

Any blood shed by the wearer of this sacred armour will not be in vain — beneath the ceramite shell is an ingenious mechanism that collects every blessed drop of crimson, so that it can later serve as the basis for a rune priest's healing balms and sacred potions.

Any blood shed by the wearer of this sacred armour will not be in vain — beneath the ceramite shell is an ingenious mechanism that collects every blessed drop of crimson, so that it can later serve as the basis for a rune priest's healing balms and sacred potions.

Any blood shed by the wearer of this sacred armour will not be in vain — beneath the ceramite shell is an ingenious mechanism that collects every blessed drop of crimson, so that it can later serve as the basis for a rune priest's healing balms and sacred potions.

languages.text: 这套华丽的护甲上布满了六芒星状的符文，头盔的面甲上雕刻着细小的符文，祈求狩猎之灵的庇佑。这套神圣盔甲的佩戴者流下的每滴血都不会白流，它的陶钢外壳下面有个精巧的装置，可以收集每一滴受到祝福的鲜血。日后，这些鲜血可以在符文牧师手中，作为治疗药膏与神圣药剂的材料。
languages.original_text: The magnificent armour is covered in hexagrammic wards, and the helmet's visors are carved with microrunes invoking the beneficence of the spirits of the hunt. Any blood shed by the wearer of this sacred armour will not be in vain — beneath the ceramite shell is an ingenious mechanism that collects every blessed drop of crimson, so that it can later serve as the basis for a Rune Priest's healing balms and sacred potions.

traits.locale_text: 这套华丽的护甲上布满了六芒星状的符文，头盔的面甲上雕刻着细小的符文，祈求狩猎之灵的庇佑。这套神圣盔甲的佩戴者流下的每滴血都不会白流，它的陶钢外壳下面有个精巧的装置，可以收集每一滴受到祝福的鲜血。日后，这些鲜血可以在符文牧师手中，作为治疗药膏与神圣药剂的材料。

languages.text: 立派なアーマーは六芒星で区域分けされており、ヘルメットのバイザーには狩りの精霊の恩恵を授かるためのミクロルーンが刻まれている。この神聖なアーマーを着る者は血を無駄に流すことはない――セラマイトの殻の真下は精巧なつくりになっており、聖なる深紅の滴を一滴残らずて集められる。ルーンプリーストが治療薬や聖薬の基礎としてこの血液を使うのだ。
languages.original_text: The magnificent armour is covered in hexagrammic wards, and the helmet's visors are carved with microrunes invoking the beneficence of the spirits of the hunt. Any blood shed by the wearer of this sacred armour will not be in vain — beneath the ceramite shell is an ingenious mechanism that collects every blessed drop of crimson, so that it can later serve as the basis for a Rune Priest's healing balms and sacred potions.

traits.locale_text: 立派なアーマーは六芒星で区域分けされており、ヘルメットのバイザーには狩りの精霊の恩恵を授かるためのミクロルーンが刻まれている。この神聖なアーマーを着る者は血を無駄に流すことはない――セラマイトの殻の真下は精巧なつくりになっており、聖なる深紅の滴を一滴残らずて集められる。ルーンプリーストが治療薬や聖薬の基礎としてこの血液を使うのだ。

languages.text: Esta magnífica armadura está cubierta con custodias hexagrámicas y los visores del casco tienen microrrunas inscritas que invocan la benevolencia de los espíritus de la caza. La sangre derramada por el portador de esta armadura sagrada no será en vano: bajo el caparazón de ceramita hay un ingenioso mecanismo que capta cada preciada gota escarlata para que sirva a un Sacerdote Rúnico como base para bálsamos curativos y pociones sagradas.
languages.original_text: The magnificent armour is covered in hexagrammic wards, and the helmet's visors are carved with microrunes invoking the beneficence of the spirits of the hunt. Any blood shed by the wearer of this sacred armour will not be in vain — beneath the ceramite shell is an ingenious mechanism that collects every blessed drop of crimson, so that it can later serve as the basis for a Rune Priest's healing balms and sacred potions.

traits.locale_text: Esta magnífica armadura está cubierta con custodias hexagrámicas y los visores del casco tienen microrrunas inscritas que invocan la benevolencia de los espíritus de la caza. La sangre derramada por el portador de esta armadura sagrada no será en vano: bajo el caparazón de ceramita hay un ingenioso mecanismo que capta cada preciada gota escarlata para que sirva a un Sacerdote Rúnico como base para bálsamos curativos y pociones sagradas.

languages.text: Cette magnifique armure sacrée est couverte de protections hexagrammiques et la visière de son casque est gravée de microrunes invoquant la bienveillance des esprits de la chasse. Si son porteur verse du sang, il est recueilli par l'ingénieux mécanisme installé sous la couche de céramite afin qu'un prêtre des runes puisse s'en servir pour préparer des baumes curatifs ou des potions sacrées.
languages.original_text: The magnificent armour is covered in hexagrammic wards, and the helmet's visors are carved with microrunes invoking the beneficence of the spirits of the hunt. Any blood shed by the wearer of this sacred armour will not be in vain — beneath the ceramite shell is an ingenious mechanism that collects every blessed drop of crimson, so that it can later serve as the basis for a Rune Priest's healing balms and sacred potions.

traits.locale_text: Cette magnifique armure sacrée est couverte de protections hexagrammiques et la visière de son casque est gravée de microrunes invoquant la bienveillance des esprits de la chasse. Si son porteur verse du sang, il est recueilli par l'ingénieux mécanisme installé sous la couche de céramite afin qu'un prêtre des runes puisse s'en servir pour préparer des baumes curatifs ou des potions sacrées.

languages.text: Die prächtige Rüstung ist mit hexagrammatischen Schutzzeichen bedeckt, und auf dem Visor des Helms sind Mikrorunen eingraviert, die die Gunst der Jagdgeister beschwören. Kein vom Träger dieser heiligen Rüstung vergossenes Blut ist vergebens – unter der Ceramit-Hülle befindet sich ein genialer Mechanismus, der jeden gesegneten roten Tropfen einsammelt, damit er später als Basis der Heilsalben und heiligen Tränke eines Runenpriesters dienen kann.
languages.original_text: The magnificent armour is covered in hexagrammic wards, and the helmet's visors are carved with microrunes invoking the beneficence of the spirits of the hunt. Any blood shed by the wearer of this sacred armour will not be in vain — beneath the ceramite shell is an ingenious mechanism that collects every blessed drop of crimson, so that it can later serve as the basis for a Rune Priest's healing balms and sacred potions.

traits.locale_text: Die prächtige Rüstung ist mit hexagrammatischen Schutzzeichen bedeckt, und auf dem Visor des Helms sind Mikrorunen eingraviert, die die Gunst der Jagdgeister beschwören. Kein vom Träger dieser heiligen Rüstung vergossenes Blut ist vergebens – unter der Ceramit-Hülle befindet sich ein genialer Mechanismus, der jeden gesegneten roten Tropfen einsammelt, damit er später als Basis der Heilsalben und heiligen Tränke eines Runenpriesters dienen kann.

languages.text: Görkemli zırh, heksagramik nazarlıklarla kaplı. Miğferin vizörüne, av ruhlarının ihsanını uyandıran mikrorünler kazınmış. Bu kutsal zırhı giyen kişinin döktüğü kanlar boşa gitmiyor. Seramit kaplamanın altında, her bir kutsal kızıl damlayı toplayan dahiyane bir mekanizma bulunuyor. Bu sayede toplanan damlalar, Rün Rahipleri tarafından hazırlanan şifalı merhem ve kutsal iksirlerin temelini oluşturuyor.
languages.original_text: The magnificent armour is covered in hexagrammic wards, and the helmet's visors are carved with microrunes invoking the beneficence of the spirits of the hunt. Any blood shed by the wearer of this sacred armour will not be in vain — beneath the ceramite shell is an ingenious mechanism that collects every blessed drop of crimson, so that it can later serve as the basis for a Rune Priest's healing balms and sacred potions.

traits.locale_text: Görkemli zırh, heksagramik nazarlıklarla kaplanmış. Miğferin vizörüne, av ruhlarının ihsanını uyandıran mikrorünler kazınmış. Bu kutsal zırhı giyen kişinin döktüğü kanlar boşa gitmez. Seramit kaplamanın altında her bir kutsal kızıl damlayı toplayan, becerikli bir mekanizma bulunur. Toplanan damlalar, rün rahiplerinin şifalı balsamlarının ve kutsal iksirlerinin temelini oluşturur.

Görkemli zırh, heksagramik nazarlıklarla kaplanmış. Miğferin vizörüne, av ruhlarının ihsanını uyandıran mikrorünler kazınmış. Bu kutsal zırhı giyen kişinin döktüğü kanlar boşa gitmez. Seramit kaplamanın altında her bir kutsal kızıl damlayı toplayan, becerikli bir mekanizma bulunur. Toplanan damlalar, rün rahiplerinin şifalı balsamlarının ve kutsal iksirlerinin temelini oluşturur.
